brand.name: Quetrex
brand.targetAudience: Developers, non-technical founders, and agencies who want to build stellar apps with AI assistance
brand.voiceTone: Professional yet approachable. Clear and concise. Confident but not arrogant.

themes.strategy: Dark mode default, user can switch to light

primary.name: Indigo
primary.reasoning: Balances futuristic/creative (like violet) with trustworthy/professional (like blue). More universally appealing than pure violet while maintaining distinctiveness.

headingFont.name: Plus Jakarta Sans
headingFont.reasoning: Modern, geometric, distinctive. Conveys futuristic professionalism.

bodyFont.name: Inter
bodyFont.reasoning: Excellent readability for long focus sessions. Industry standard for body text.

monoFont.name: JetBrains Mono
monoFont.reasoning: Developer-friendly with ligatures. Professional for code display.

borderRadius.reasoning: Friendlier, approachable feel like Linear. Consistent with calm/focused personality.

decisions.reasoning: More universally appealing while maintaining futuristic feel. Less 'AI-ish' than pure violet.

decisions.decision: Dark mode default with light mode option
decisions.reasoning: Target audience (developers, long focus sessions) prefers dark. Matches Linear/Tailwind inspiration.
Friendlier, more approachable. Aligns with calm/focused brand personality.
